extendedInfo.description: All New for 2013! Whether you play on Yahoo!, ESPN, NFL or of course CBSSports.com, this will be your go-to source for the best fantasy football news, stats, projections, analysis and advice -- no longer just for CBSSports.com fantasy players. Plus, CBSSports.com users get easy-to-use roster management and live scoring.Rebuilt and redesigned for 2013, we went back to the drawing board -- listening to YOUR feedback. It's easier for you to use, gives you faster access to scoring and is even more reliable. Available on phone and tablet!Whether you play with CBSSports.com or one of the other sites (no user account required!), youâll get:PRE-DRAFT PREP.  Our award-winning experts provide the advice you seek and the projected 2013 stats you need to have your best draft ever.DRAFT COMPANION.  Access to the latest stats, projections, rankings and news.PLAYER NEWS.  Updated news, injury reports and performance predictions that give you the insider advantage.PROJECTED STATS & RANKINGS.  Up-to-date performance projections from our top-ranked experts.PLUS, CBSSports.com fantasy football players get even more:EASY TEAM MANAGEMENT.  This season, itâs even easier to set your line-up, add/drop players and make trades.  For you fantasy junkies, you can even jump between your different teams in only two taps.LIVE SCORING.  Get fast and accurate fantasy point updates of all the live NFL action so youâll know exactly how your crushing your competition.PERSONALIZED CONTENT.  Quick and easy access to your teamâs and your leagueâs players and performance.OFFICE POOL MANAGER.  If you play our Pickâem games and Survivor Pools, in future releases you will be able to make your picks and view your real-time scoring and league standings.Download NOW to kick-off your winning season.

reviews.title: Getting Much Better
reviews.comment: Very impressed with the updates. There are making this app much easier and better incorporated into leagues. Thanks for the hard work and keep improving!
reviews.author: Edward Marshall II

reviews.title: Wtf!??!
reviews.comment: I paid $150 for the league and the app is sub par. It needs me to log in to view the head to head scoring page and the servers are down mid game so it won\'t even load.
reviews.author: Neilson Worth

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Looks like you can set your lineup. Paid way too much for the league for how many ads online and in the app. Not all conversations from league homepage show in app. Has a section for \"coming soon\" - when? Season starts next week.  Update: trying to view league talk crashes the app. Is this ever going to be an option?
reviews.author: Matt LeVeque

reviews.title: No talk.
reviews.comment: Everytime you go to view your league conversations after the update...\"unfortunately the app stops working\"
reviews.author: Adam Keeton

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: No head to head scoring is unacceptable. App redirects to webpage for scoring and makes you log in again. Also Should have all teams as drop down menu when viewing \"my team\".  Come on CBS, put some effort in here.
reviews.author: J Scott

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I like the new look but dislike how you have to go to the web site to see what your players did
reviews.author: Michael Reader

reviews.title: iOS better
reviews.comment: Not sure why, but cbs always seems to gear their apps to iPhone users while android users are left  behind.  I like the new look/feel but why is there no league \"home\" button like there is on IOS????  Seems to be the focus of that app, yet it is no where to be found!  I pay a lot of $ for the fantasy site because it is far superior to others, but cbs just can\'t get their mobile stuff figured out!
reviews.author: Ryan Cox

reviews.comment: Unfortunately football has stopped . that\'s the error I keep getting everytime I try to view\tFantasy scores. This app sucks right now !!
reviews.author: Keith Mcgeorge

reviews.title: Cbs fantasy app is horrible
reviews.comment: When I get to the main pg, it tells me I\'m not logged in even though I am. So when I press to go to my team, it takes me to the website so I have to manage my team from the website instead of the app.
reviews.author: Manny DeLaRosa

reviews.title: Year after year
reviews.comment: The app trys but never performs! Getting projected scores and NOT actual scores. Tells me I have too many players in one area or another.  Why can\'t this be done right?
reviews.author: Mike Smalley

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Can\'t check scores. It tries to re-route you to the website when you check scores but crashes. Every time.
reviews.author: Martin Kelly

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Where are my players points? I don\'t dare to see their projected points after they have played.  Also, if you try to add player,  where are the undrafted players?
reviews.author: Phil Collver

reviews.title: Not loading at all, was working
reviews.comment: Going to uninstall, but you have to be kidding me. Worked fine until the 4pm games. Now won\'t even open! Please fix.
reviews.author: Nick Weimmer

reviews.title: Talk about battery killer
reviews.comment: Come on CBS, you can do better than this. Pay someone to make a decent app.
reviews.author: Rich Halvorson

reviews.title: Day 1, won\'t work
reviews.comment: Tried to open the app during the first game, and it wouldn\'t bring up any of my stuff (league home, my team, scoring, etc.).  Crashed, closed itself, and when I tried to reopen, it wouldn\'t even go the main page, just showed that chalk drawing of a play, and gave me an error message. Unacceptable!  Also, when it does work, hate that I can\'t set it to open to my own team, doesn\'t show side by side comparison of the matchup, and doesn\'t show player scoring projections when making roster changes.
reviews.author: Jennifer Walters

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Have to log in every time and and it doesn\'t recognize my password or login all the Oreo.
reviews.author: Chris Malinoski

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Does not keep correct score. Initially correctthen starts to subtract points. Not good
reviews.author: Pete Goad

reviews.title: Almost there
reviews.comment: I can check scores and edit players, but for some reason it keeps crashing when I try to access my league\'s home
reviews.author: Kirk Jackson

reviews.comment: Scores are right but shows no details (yards, tds, etc). Also duplicates starters in the bench portion. This app sux.\tPew!
reviews.author: mike janakes

reviews.title: Everything you need
reviews.comment: The live scoring on this app is amazing. Everything u want to see is displayed in front of you on one page and is updated in real time. Such an improvement over years past when this app was extremely lacking.
reviews.author: Alan Hill
